name: Chino Pant - Khaky
description: FREE SHIPPING AUSTRALIA WIDE White Wolf Chinos are constructed in a pure cotton twill. Featuring a button closure to the waist, pockets to the hips, and twin welt pockets on the back with button through fastenings. These very comfy and durable chino are a staple to any lads wardrobe. Be sure to grab yourself a pair today. FREE SHIPPING AUSTRALIA WIDE Yep! That's right folks we offer free shipping to all our fellow country men and women AUSTRALIA ONLY. Sorry foreigners we do offer super low rates on shipping to your country though, so no need to worry. We have struck up a deal with Australia Post and DHL. So you can be assured that your order will be in safe hands. We also offer 30 DAY EXCHANGE period. So if it's a wrong size or not quite what you wanted, no worries at all, you can exchange your purchase up to 30 days from the day you received it. We want to make your online shopping a smooth, easy and fun experience. SIZE GUIDE WAIST MEASUREMENT 30 - 76-81cm 32 - 81-86cm 34 - 86-91cm 36 - 91-96cm 38 - 96-101cm INSIDE LEG MEASUREMENT All White Wolf Jeans/Chinos are Regular inside leg length of 81cm. HOW TO MEASURE YOUR WHITE WOLF JEANS/CHINOS SIZE. Measure around your natural waistline, place the tape just above where your belt would be and measure all the way around your backside.
